Package pages_kelvin

Class Cart

java.lang.Object
pages_kelvin.Cart
public class Cart extends Object
Singleton class representing a user's cart.
Author:
Kelvin Dhoman

      Retrieves the singleton instance of a Cart object.
      Returns:
      The current user's cart.

    • addProduct

      Add a product to the user's cart.
      Parameters:
      productToAdd - The product to add to the cart.

    • getCartSize

      public int getCartSize()
      Retrieves the user's cart size.
      Returns:
      An int value of the size of the cart.

    • calculatePreTaxTotal

      public Double calculatePreTaxTotal()
      Calculates the total of the user's cart before tax is applied.
      Returns:
      The double value of the user's cart cost before tax.

    • calculateTaxTotal

      public Double calculateTaxTotal()
      Calculates the tax amount alone not grand total.
      Returns:
      The tax amount of the cart.

    • calculateGrandTotal

      public Double calculateGrandTotal()
      Calculates the grand total of the whole cart with amount and tax combined.
      Returns:
      The grand total of the cost of the cart.

    • clearCart

      public void clearCart()
      Clear cart of all items.
